title: Leaver Buster System SUCKS
body: I got leaver buster because of my slow internet connection that sucks It's not my fault I kept on Disconnecting and yet they gave me a LeaverBuster penalty they gave it to me two times Already! I finished the first Leaverbuster(5matchmade games) then after 2 more games I got disconnected from one of them and got another leaverbuster. FML{{summoner:14}}

replies.body:
Hi folks

It absolutely sucks to get disconnected from a game, especially when it seems like it isn't your fault (internet drop or PC crash).  What is important to remember is that it really sucks for everyone else in the game too, because they have to play 4v5.  Even when you win at a 5v4 it feels a bit dirty, because you know the other team had a crappy game. It wastes everyone's time and nobody wants to be _that guy_!

Thats why it is important that you, as a player, are responsible for making sure that you can maintain a stable connection to the League servers when you play.  If you know you have a slow/crappy internet connection that drops out all the time - its important for you to learn what the cause is and make sure it gets fixed.  

While everyone has the odd issue from time to time, leaverbuster is actually doing its job perfectly well when people who repeatedly leave games get put in a low priority queue.  It is there to make sure you realise you're actually causing problems for a lot of other players and to give you a strong push towards fixing them.

There are some [good resources](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) on the player support site for helping you figure out what the cause might be, and I'd strongly suggest you take a look!  You can also [get in touch with our player support team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) if you are lost and they will help you figure out what is wrong.

Cheers
